author: Kim Lyons
title: Cuomo issues order allowing New Yorkers to obtain marriage licenses over Zoom
description: With New York’s marriage bureaus closed because of the coronavirus pandemic, Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Saturday that the state will begin allowing marriage licenses to be granted remotely, and, for clerks to conduct ceremonies over video.  “There is now no excus…
content:
The order also allows clerks to conduct ceremonies over video
Illustration by Grayson Blackmon
